thread.title: Thursday’s Travel News and Tips
thread.title_full: Thursday’s Travel News and Tips - The New York Times

author: Ashley Winchester
title: Thursday’s Travel News and Tips
text:
Our weekday morning digest that includes consumer news, deals, tips and anything else that travelers may want to know.
SPACEPORT READY FOR LIFTOFF
Spaceport America, the world’s first purpose-built, F.A.A.-licensed commercial spaceport, is now open to the public.
The New Mexico facility is home to Virgin Galactic’s SpaceShipTwo and WhiteKnightTwo spacecraft, in which the company plans to eventually carry the first civilians — 700 of whom have already signed up for the opportunity — into orbit.
In Transit Travel news, deals and tips, written by the editors and reporters of the Travel section.
